alert.note: Alert for Crittenden; Union (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 17 at 12:57PM EDT until March 19 at 11:36AM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky...Illinois... Ohio River at Shawneetown affecting Union, Crittenden, Hardin and Gallatin Counties. .The Ohio river at Shawneetown will continue to fall this week into next. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Shawneetown. * WHEN...Until late Saturday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 37.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Saturday morning and continue falling to 18.5 feet Sunday, March 27. - Flood stage is 33.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
